___mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each nginx task.

___role.description: Deploy nginx only on nodes with this role.

___contentUrl.description: URL of content that needs to be hosted.

___contentDir.description: Path of directory, relative to sandbox, containing HTML code.

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each nginx instance.

___bridge.description: Whether to use BRIDGE networking mode for Docker container. By default, this is false and HOST mode networking is used.
